Player History
Traded from Pittsburgh to Colorado on 3/1/2014 (Going to COL: P Tyler Glasnow, CF Gregory Polanco, RF Garrett Jones, RF Andrew Lambo. Going to PIT: LF Carlos Gonzalez)...
Injured on 8/16/2014 with a Fractured Foot, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 4/13/2015 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 4/25/2015 with a Bruised Heel, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/29/2015 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/1/2016, off Charlie Morton (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/6/2016, off Matt Harvey (NYM)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Pittsburgh on 5/5/2017...
2/2/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,178,571 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/25/2019 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,492,857 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 7/19/2020...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 8/18/2020...
Injured on 10/3/2020 with a Torn Hamstring Muscle, out for full season...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,421,429 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/2/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $8,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2024, hitting .448 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
10/28/2024: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $9,400,000 per year, for 4 years.
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (N) on 7/24/2025...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 5/13/2027...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2027...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/4/2029 to a 2-year deal worth $6,860,000 per year...
